description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(110).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,42,0,-1).
mathematica: Denominator[Convergents[Sqrt[110],30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 10 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 2 x - x^2)/(1 - 42 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013*)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
